spell_tooltip.description:
Wrath, Starfire, Cyclone, and Combo-Point generating abilities extend the duration of your active heal over time effects by 1.0 sec on up to 3 allies.

Starsurge and Combo-Point spending abilities increase the rate of your heal over time spells by 20% for 4 sec.

Casting Barkskin or Ironbark sprouts thorns on you for 12 sec. When victim to melee attacks, thorns deals 151,197 Nature damage back to the attacker.

Attackers also have their movement speed reduced by 50% for 4 sec.

Wild Growth is now instant cast, and when you heal 6 allies with Wild Growth you gain Full Bloom. This effect has a 30 sec cooldown.

Full Bloom
Your next Wild Growth applies Lifebloom to all targets at 100% effectiveness. Lasts for 30 sec.
Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.

Heals the target for 550,059 over 17 sec.

You can apply Rejuvenation twice to the same target.
Call down a burst of energy, causing 379,468 Arcane damage to the target, and 131,769 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 5 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Heals up to 5 injured allies within 30 yards of the target for 244,433 over 7 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.
Launch a surge of stellar energies at the target, dealing 438,832 Astral damage.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.
Nature's Cure additionally removes all Curse and Poison effects.

Shapeshift into Moonkin Form, increasing the damage of your spells by 10% and your armor by 125%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Physical damage and Armor increased by 6%.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.
A quick beam of solar light burns the enemy for 21,228 Nature damage and then an additional 223,419 Nature damage over 18 sec to the primary target and all enemies within 8 yards.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
Healing you receive is increased by 4%.
Increases the range of all of your spells by 5 yards.
Shift into Cat Form and increase your movement speed by 200%, reducing gradually over 5 sec.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.
Instantly heals you for 30% of maximum health. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Increases your movement speed by 15%.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.

Rejuvenation's duration is increased by 3 sec.

Regrowth's duration is increased by 3 sec when cast on yourself.
Blasts targets within 20 yards in front of you with a violent Typhoon, knocking them back and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 6 sec. Usable in all shapeshift forms.

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and invoke the spirit of Ursol to let loose a deafening roar, incapacitating all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Magical damage dealt by your spells increased by 25%.
Form a bond with an ally. Your self-healing also heals your bonded ally for 10% of the amount healed. Your healing to your bonded ally also heals you for 8% of the amount healed.

Shred, Rake, and Skull Bash can be used in any form and shift you into Cat Form, if necessary. 

Mangle can be used in any form and shifts you into Bear Form. 

Wrath and Starfire shift you into Moonkin Form, if known.

Heals the target for 374,622 over 15 sec. When Lifebloom expires or is dispelled, the target is instantly healed for 213,926.

May be active on one target at a time.
Heals you for 3% of your maximum health every 5 sec. If you are at full health, an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.
Your next Regrowth, Rebirth, or Entangling Roots is instant, free, castable in all forms, and heals for an additional 200%.
Clearcast Regrowths heal for an additional 30%.
Swiftmend heals the target for 215,123 over 9 sec.
Nature's Swiftness now has 2 charges.
For each Rejuvenation you have active, Regrowth's cost is reduced by 8% and critical effect chance is increased by 8%, up to a maximum of 96%.
Increases Omen of Clarity's chance to activate Clearcasting to 5% and Clearcasting can stack 1 additional time.

Abundance now also reduces the cast time of Regrowth by 5% per stack.

Cenarion Ward's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec and its duration is increased by 2 sec.
Grows a healing blossom at the target location, restoring 27,823 health to three injured allies within 10 yards every 1.5 sec for 30 sec. Limit 1.

Heals all allies within 45 yards for 1.5 million over 3.8 sec. Each heal heals the target for another 9,418 over 8 sec, stacking.

Healing decreased beyond 5 targets.

The target's skin becomes as tough as Ironwood, reducing damage taken by 20% for 16 sec.

Allies protected by your Ironbark also receive 75% of the healing from each of your active Rejuvenations.
Swiftmend increases the healing of your next Regrowth or Rejuvenation by 150%, or your next Wild Growth by 50%.

Summons a Treant which will immediately cast Swiftmend on your current target, healing for 157,951.  The Treant will cast Nourish on that target or a nearby ally periodically, healing for 46,074. Lasts 15 sec.
While channeling Tranquility, your other Druid spell cooldowns are reduced by up to 20 seconds.
When Rejuvenation heals a target below 60% health, it applies Cultivation to the target, healing them for 29,502 over 6 sec.
Ironbark's cooldown is reduced by 20 sec.
Regrowth's healing over time is increased by 50%, and it also applies to the target of your Lifebloom.

Nourish
Regrowth decreases the cast time of your next Nourish by 33% and causes it to receive an additional 33% bonus from Mastery: Harmony. Stacks up to 3 times.

Grove Guardians
Treants from Grove Guardians also cast Wild Growth immediately when summoned, healing 5 allies within 40 yds for 54,036 over 7 sec.
Allies protected by your Ironbark also receive 75% of the healing from each of your active Rejuvenations and Ironbark's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Each target healed by Efflorescence is healed for an additional 19,284 over 6 sec.

Call upon the spirits for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of 12 Druid spells and abilities over 3 sec.

You will cast Ferocious Bite, Shred, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.
Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 8 sec.

Your abilities are amplified based on your current shapeshift form, granting an additional effect.

Wrath, Starfire, and Starsurge deal 30% additional damage and generate 30,625 Mana.

Bear Form
Ironfur grants 30% additional armor and generates 43,750 Mana.

 Cat Form
Rip, Ferocious Bite, and Maim deal 60% additional damage and generate 174,999 Mana when cast with 5 combo points.

Incarnation: Tree of Life
During Incarnation: Tree of Life, you summon a Grove Guardian every 10 sec. The cooldown of Incarnation: Tree of Life is reduced by 5.0 sec when Grove Guardians fade.

 Convoke the Spirits
Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.

Consuming Clearcasting now causes your Regrowth to also cast Nourish onto a nearby injured ally at 60% effectiveness, preferring those with your heal over time effects.

 Nourish:
Heals a friendly target for 519,943.  Receives 300% bonus from Mastery: Harmony.
When your Rejuvenation heals a full health target, its duration is increased by 2 sec, up to a maximum total increase of 4 sec per cast.

Extends the duration of all of your heal over time effects on friendly targets within 60 yards by 6 sec, and increases the rate of your heal over time effects by 25% for 8 sec.

Affected allies are healed for 1.3 million, split evenly among them.
Wild Growth has a 60% chance to cause your next Rejuvenation or Regrowth to apply to 2 additional allies within 20 yards of the target.
You can apply Rejuvenation twice to the same target. Rejuvenation's duration is increased by 2 sec.
Grove Guardians causes your next targeted heal to create 3 Dream Petals near the target, healing up to 3 nearby allies for 142,751. Stacks up to 3 charges.
Your Grove Guardians cast Moonfire on nearby targets about once every 6 sec.
Your maximum mana is increased by 5%.
Your Regrowth protects you, reducing damage you take by 8% while your Regrowth is on you.
Your Grove Guardians increase the healing of your Rejuvenation, Efflorescence, and Lifebloom by 10% while active.
Casting Swiftmend increases your Haste by 10% for 6 sec.

Wrath and Starfire damage increased by 10%. 

Regrowth, Wild Growth, and Swiftmend healing increased by 9%.
Your Grove Guardians' healing is increased by 30%.
Healing spells cast with Dream Surge generate an additional Dream Petal.

Every 5 Regrowths you cast makes your next Wrath, Starfire, or Entangling Roots instant and increases damage it deals by 100%.

Every 5 Starsurges you cast makes your next Regrowth or Entangling roots instant.
Each of your Grove Guardians increases your healing done by 5% while active.

Rake the target for 44,616 Bleed damage and an additional 345,039 Bleed damage over 15 sec. 

While stealthed, Rake will also stun the target for 4 sec and deal 60% increased damage.

Awards 1 combo point.
Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.

Heals the target for 550,059 over 17 sec.

You can apply Rejuvenation twice to the same target.
Rake, Rip, and Thrash damage increased by 10%.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Heals up to 5 injured allies within 30 yards of the target for 244,433 over 7 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nature's Cure additionally removes all Curse and Poison effects.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.
Increases armor by 25,696 for 7 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Healing you receive is increased by 4%.
Increases the range of all of your spells by 5 yards.
Fly to a nearby ally's position.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.
Instantly heals you for 30% of maximum health. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Increases your movement speed by 15%.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 120 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.

Rejuvenation's duration is increased by 3 sec.

Regrowth's duration is increased by 3 sec when cast on yourself.
Roots the target and all enemies within 12 yards in place for 10 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
For 4 sec after shifting into Bear Form, your health and armor are increased by 15%.
Form a bond with an ally. Your self-healing also heals your bonded ally for 10% of the amount healed. Your healing to your bonded ally also heals you for 8% of the amount healed.
Casting Regrowth increases your movement speed and healing received by 8% for 6 sec.

Shred, Rake, and Skull Bash can be used in any form and shift you into Cat Form, if necessary. 

Mangle can be used in any form and shifts you into Bear Form. 

Wrath and Starfire shift you into Moonkin Form, if known.
For 15 sec, all single-target healing also damages a nearby enemy target for 20% of the healing done.

Heals the target for 374,622 over 15 sec. When Lifebloom expires or is dispelled, the target is instantly healed for 217,550.

May be active on one target at a time.
Heals you for 3% of your maximum health every 5 sec. If you are at full health, an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.
Your next Regrowth, Rebirth, or Entangling Roots is instant, free, castable in all forms, and heals for an additional 200%.
Clearcast Regrowths heal for an additional 30%.

Increases Omen of Clarity's chance to activate Clearcasting to 5% and Clearcasting can stack 1 additional time.

Abundance now also reduces the cast time of Regrowth by 5% per stack.

Cenarion Ward's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec and its duration is increased by 2 sec.
Grows a healing blossom at the target location, restoring 27,885 health to three injured allies within 10 yards every 1.5 sec for 30 sec. Limit 1.

Heals all allies within 45 yards for 1.6 million over 3.8 sec. Each heal heals the target for another 9,418 over 8 sec, stacking.

Healing decreased beyond 5 targets.

Allies protected by your Ironbark also receive 75% of the healing from each of your active Rejuvenations.
Swiftmend increases the healing of your next Regrowth or Rejuvenation by 150%, or your next Wild Growth by 50%.

Summons a Treant which will immediately cast Swiftmend on your current target, healing for 159,481.  The Treant will cast Nourish on that target or a nearby ally periodically, healing for 44,640. Lasts 15 sec.
While channeling Tranquility, your other Druid spell cooldowns are reduced by up to 20 seconds.
When Rejuvenation heals a target below 60% health, it applies Cultivation to the target, healing them for 29,502 over 6 sec.
Wild Growth heals 1 additional target.
Ironbark's cooldown is reduced by 20 sec.
Regrowth's healing over time is increased by 50%, and it also applies to the target of your Lifebloom.

Nourish
Regrowth decreases the cast time of your next Nourish by 33% and causes it to receive an additional 33% bonus from Mastery: Harmony. Stacks up to 3 times.

Grove Guardians
Treants from Grove Guardians also cast Wild Growth immediately when summoned, healing 5 allies within 40 yds for 54,036 over 7 sec.
Allies protected by your Ironbark also receive 75% of the healing from each of your active Rejuvenations and Ironbark's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Each target healed by Efflorescence is healed for an additional 19,284 over 6 sec.

Shapeshift into the Tree of Life, increasing healing done by 10%, increasing armor by 120%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects. Functionality of Rejuvenation, Wild Growth, Regrowth, Entangling Roots, and Wrath is enhanced.

Lasts 30 sec. You may shapeshift in and out of this form for its duration.
Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 8 sec.

Your abilities are amplified based on your current shapeshift form, granting an additional effect.

Wrath, Starfire, and Starsurge deal 30% additional damage and generate 30,625 Mana.

Bear Form
Ironfur grants 30% additional armor and generates 43,750 Mana.

 Cat Form

 Convoke the Spirits

Rejuvenation instantly heals your target for 15% of its total periodic effect and Regrowth's duration is increased by 3 sec.

When Rejuvenation heals a target below 60% health, it applies Cultivation to the target, healing them for 29,502 over 6 sec.
Ironbark's cooldown is reduced by 20 sec.
Regrowth's healing over time is increased by 50%, and it also applies to the target of your Lifebloom.

Nourish
Regrowth decreases the cast time of your next Nourish by 33% and causes it to receive an additional 33% bonus from Mastery: Harmony. Stacks up to 3 times.

Grove Guardians
Treants from Grove Guardians also cast Wild Growth immediately when summoned, healing 5 allies within 40 yds for 54,036 over 7 sec.
Allies protected by your Ironbark also receive 75% of the healing from each of your active Rejuvenations and Ironbark's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Each target healed by Efflorescence is healed for an additional 19,284 over 6 sec.

Call upon the spirits for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of 12 Druid spells and abilities over 3 sec.

You will cast Ferocious Bite, Shred, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.
Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 8 sec.

Your abilities are amplified based on your current shapeshift form, granting an additional effect.

Wrath, Starfire, and Starsurge deal 30% additional damage and generate 30,625 Mana.

Bear Form
Ironfur grants 30% additional armor and generates 43,750 Mana.

 Cat Form
Rip, Ferocious Bite, and Maim deal 60% additional damage and generate 174,999 Mana when cast with 5 combo points.

Incarnation: Tree of Life
During Incarnation: Tree of Life, you summon a Grove Guardian every 10 sec. The cooldown of Incarnation: Tree of Life is reduced by 5.0 sec when Grove Guardians fade.

 Convoke the Spirits
Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.

Consuming Clearcasting now causes your Regrowth to also cast Nourish onto a nearby injured ally at 60% effectiveness, preferring those with your heal over time effects.

 Nourish:
Heals a friendly target for 542,780.  Receives 300% bonus from Mastery: Harmony.
When your Rejuvenation heals a full health target, its duration is increased by 2 sec, up to a maximum total increase of 4 sec per cast.

Extends the duration of all of your heal over time effects on friendly targets within 60 yards by 6 sec, and increases the rate of your heal over time effects by 25% for 8 sec.

Affected allies are healed for 1.3 million, split evenly among them.
Wild Growth has a 60% chance to cause your next Rejuvenation or Regrowth to apply to 2 additional allies within 20 yards of the target.
You can apply Rejuvenation twice to the same target. Rejuvenation's duration is increased by 2 sec.
Your Grove Guardians cast Moonfire on nearby targets about once every 6 sec.
Your maximum mana is increased by 5%.
Your Regrowth protects you, reducing damage you take by 8% while your Regrowth is on you.
Your Grove Guardians increase the healing of your Rejuvenation, Efflorescence, and Lifebloom by 10% while active.
Casting Swiftmend increases your Haste by 10% for 6 sec.

Wrath and Starfire damage increased by 10%. 

Regrowth, Wild Growth, and Swiftmend healing increased by 9%.
Your Grove Guardians' healing is increased by 30%.
Healing spells cast with Dream Surge generate an additional Dream Petal.

Every 5 Regrowths you cast makes your next Wrath, Starfire, or Entangling Roots instant and increases damage it deals by 100%.

Every 5 Starsurges you cast makes your next Regrowth or Entangling roots instant.
Each of your Grove Guardians increases your healing done by 5% while active.
Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.

Heals the target for 550,059 over 17 sec.

You can apply Rejuvenation twice to the same target.
Call down a burst of energy, causing 384,392 Arcane damage to the target, and 130,349 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 5 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Heals up to 5 injured allies within 30 yards of the target for 244,433 over 7 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.
Launch a surge of stellar energies at the target, dealing 440,974 Astral damage.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nature's Cure additionally removes all Curse and Poison effects.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
Healing you receive is increased by 4%.
Increases the range of all of your spells by 5 yards.
Fly to a nearby ally's position.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, instantly heal for 10% of your health.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.

Wrath, Starsurge, and Starfire damage increased by 5%. 

Starsurge's cooldown is reduced by 4 sec and its mana cost is reduced by 50%.
Increases your movement speed by 15%.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 120 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.

Rejuvenation's duration is increased by 3 sec.

Regrowth's duration is increased by 3 sec when cast on yourself.

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.
Well-Honed Instincts can trigger up to once every 90 sec.

Your Grove Guardians' Nourish and Swiftmend spells also apply a Minor Cenarion Ward that heals the target for 362,746 over 10 sec the next time they take damage.
Casting Swiftmend increases your Haste by 10% for 6 sec.

Regrowth, Wild Growth, and Swiftmend healing increased by 9%.
Your Grove Guardians' healing is increased by 30%.
Healing spells cast with Dream Surge generate an additional Dream Petal.

Every 5 Regrowths you cast makes your next Wrath, Starfire, or Entangling Roots instant and increases damage it deals by 100%.

Every 5 Starsurges you cast makes your next Regrowth or Entangling roots instant.
Each of your Grove Guardians increases your healing done by 5% while active.
Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.

Heals the target for 550,059 over 17 sec.

You can apply Rejuvenation twice to the same target.
Thrash all nearby enemies, dealing immediate physical damage and periodic bleed damage. Damage varies by shapeshift form.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Physical damage and Armor increased by 6%.
Increases armor by 25,696 for 7 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.

While in Cat Form, when you critically strike with an attack that generates a combo point, you gain an additional combo point. Damage over time cannot trigger this effect.

Mangle critical strike damage increased by 20%.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
You charge and bash the target's skull, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Healing you receive is increased by 4%.
Fly to a nearby ally's position.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.
Instantly heals you for 30% of maximum health. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Increases your movement speed by 15%.
When you use Barkskin or Survival Instincts, absorb 309,306 damage for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.
Roots the target and all enemies within 12 yards in place for 10 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and invoke the spirit of Ursol to let loose a deafening roar, incapacitating all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
For 4 sec after shifting into Bear Form, your health and armor are increased by 15%.
Cooldown reduced by 60 sec.

Shred, Rake, and Skull Bash can be used in any form and shift you into Cat Form, if necessary. 

Mangle can be used in any form and shifts you into Bear Form. 

Wrath and Starfire shift you into Moonkin Form, if known.
Maul the target for 116,139 Physical damage.
Thrash, Swipe, Moonfire, and Maul have a 15% chance to reset the cooldown on Mangle, and to cause it to generate an additional 4 Rage.
Reduces all damage you take by 60% for 6 sec.

Sharp brambles protect you, absorbing and reflecting up to 6,981 damage from each attack.

While Barkskin is active, the brambles also deal 2,767 Nature damage to all nearby enemies every 1 sec.
Mangle deals 20% additional damage against bleeding targets.
Survival Instincts now has 2 charges.

Frenzied Regeneration's healing is increased by up to 120% based on your missing health.

Frenzied Regeneration has 1 additional charge.

Go berserk for 15 sec, reducing the cooldowns of Mangle, Thrash, and Growl by 50%.

Combines with other Berserk abilities.
Increases the duration of Barkskin and Ironfur by 2.0 sec.
Mangle has a 15% chance to reduce the Rage cost of your next Ironfur by 25%.
Frenzied Regeneration heals over 2.0 additional sec and casts Rejuvenation and Regrowth on you at 200% effectiveness.
Gain magical damage reduction equal to 10% of your damage reduction from armor.
When you deal direct damage with Thrash, you gain a charge of Earthwarden, reducing the damage of the next auto attack you take by 25%. Earthwarden may have up to 3 charges.
Mangle increases the damage of your next cast of Maul or Raze, and casting Maul or Raze increases the damage of your next Mangle by 15%. Stacks up to 3.
Mangle generates 5 more Rage and deals 25% more damage.
Ironfur increases armor by an additional 15% and Barkskin reduces damage taken by an additional 10%.

Combines with other Berserk abilities.
Increases the damage and radius of Thrash by 25%.
Your damage over time effects deal their damage in 25% less time, and your healing over time effects in 15% less time.
While in Bear Form, you deal 10% increased Arcane damage, and are healed for 25% of all Arcane damage done.

Your damage has a 5% chance to trigger a free automatic Moonfire on that target. 

When this occurs, the next Moonfire you cast generates 8 Rage, and deals 300% increased direct damage.
Thrash and Maul grant you an absorb shield for 25% of the damage dealt for 15 sec.

Your direct damage melee abilities against enemies afflicted by Moonfire cause them to burn for an additional 20% Arcane damage.
